title: acer FA200 M.2 2280 SSD 2TB: PCIe 4.0 NVMe Gen4x4 with HMB & SLC, Up to 7200 MB/s Read Speed, Internal Solid State Drive for Laptop, Desktop PC & PS5 Compatible
features: [Incredible Speeds Up to 7200 MB/s] The ACER M.2 SSD FA200 leverages a cutting-edge PCIe Gen 4x4 NVMe controller with NVMe 2.0 interface to offer up to 7200 MB/s read & 6200 MB/s write speeds. Delivering unmatched responsiveness, faster app & game loading and seamless multitasking. Perfect for creators and avid gamers seeking top-tier performance!

[Enhanced Performance with HMB and SLC Cache] Utilizing the Host Memory Buffer (HMB) mechanism and SLC Cache, FA200 Internal Solid State Drives significantly boost computer boot times, file transfers and game loading speeds. 2TB storage is enough to provide you with the app, files, documents, videos and games that fall under the category of Gen4's powerful capacity, ensuring smooth, lag-free operations and efficient data transfers for you!

[Optimal Temperature Control] FA200 PCIe 2280 SSD is equipped with a Thermal Throttle and Power Management system, dynamically adjusting the SSD's temperature and power consumption. Featuring a high thermal conductivity graphene thermal pad, it ensures peak performance during intensive tasks like video editing, 3D rendering and AAA gaming. PCIe 4.0 technology outperforms other intenal SSDs, its updated firmware provides you with safe and reliable performance. A must have for gaming enthusiasts!

[Acronis Cloning Software for FREE] Enjoy seamless data transfer and backup with the included customized version of Acronis True Image. This software ensures data preservation, security and privacy by restoring system functions during accidents, natural disasters or emergencies for your internal storage!

[Superior Workflow and Gaming Experience] Our NVMe SSD FA200 provides a smooth workflow for creators and enhances gaming performance with its advanced technology, making it an ideal choice for those who demand high-speed and reliable storage solutions. 5-YEARS limited warranty for you and our services are available online 24 hours!
